name: UIDropProposal
desc: A configuration for the behavior of a drop interaction, required if a view accepts drop activities.

items.name: init(operation: UIDropOperation)
items.desc: Initializes a new drop proposal with a drop operation type.

items.name: var operation: UIDropOperation
items.desc: The drop operation that the drop interaction proposes to perform.

items.name: var isPrecise: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that proposes that the drop interaction define the drop location precisely, such as at a specific point within existing text.

items.name: var prefersFullSizePreview: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates that the drag item preview should be shown at its full, original size.
